Entries.wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with me. With you nearby I slept soundly as I have not for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ Rasmodia[#]Note From the Witch
Entries.teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ Rasmodia[#]Invitation from the Witch

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: Much as I am eager to be a mother, I cannot help but be apprehensive about the changes a child will bring to our lives...$2#$e#Swear to me that whatever comes, we will make the changes for the better.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4427: You look at me and see a reclusive freak, don't you?#$e#It is what I am...$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4429: Sometimes I catch sight of myself in the mirror and wonder what you saw in this boring face.$2#$e#Do you see it, still?$10

Entries.spring_Mon10: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I have always wanted to be a mother.$3#$b#Would it be presumptuous of me to ask how you feel about children?$1#$e#Perhaps we could...$1#$b#Well.$3#$b#Never mind.$4
Entries.winter_Sat6: I am refreshed today, and I've come to terms with my feelings. I may not be a mother to her, but I can still be a good person.$1#$b#I hope you forgive my oddness of late, @. You have seen me in a moment of weakness.$4#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Fri10: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.#7#$b#Magus. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Witch'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$1
Entries.winter_Mon10: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$4#$b#Was it Carla? Or Hannah? Maybe Jolyne?$1#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.spring_Fri6: All the powers in the universe are not enough to fix a broken heart. It can be mended, but once shattered, so shall it remain.$2#$b#Someday I will find a way to fix my own, but even that may take centuries.$2#$b#Sorry to bore you with problems of this lonely witch.$0#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Wed6: In my dreams I've been fighting a version of myself that has only existed in theory.#$b#It is an evil version, where all my desires were realized and drove me mad. She tries to get out, and each night, I stop her.#$b#How much longer will it go on for? It is uncertain.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.

Entries.TwoKids_0: When I said I wished to be a mother, I do not think I fully understood the implications.#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before they moved on to do good unto the world.#$b#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet... and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.#$b#Is this what it means to be a mother?$4
Entries.TwoKids_3: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.#$b#A mother, I hope. And nothing less.$4
Entries.winter_4: My name is...I still don't remember.#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.$1#$b#Rasmodia. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$1#$b#Or should I try mundane?$3#$b#Hannah?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Witch'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$1

Entries.3073003/f Wizard 1500/f Leah 500/w sunny: WizardSong/-1000 -1000/farmer 94 37 3 Leah 76 40 0 Wizard 66 40 1/skippable/viewport 77 40 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 200/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 200/speak Leah "Hello? Is someone there?$5"/pause 300/move Wizard 5 0 1/pause 200/speak Leah "...Oh! You scared me!$6#$b#You're the one who lives in that tower, aren't you? "/pause 300/move Wizard 3 0 1/pause 200/speak Leah "....Um...?$5"/pause 300/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 100/move Leah 1 0 3/pause 200/speak Leah "What are you doing?$6"/pause 300/speak Wizard "How is it suspended as a pendulum?"/pause 300/emote Leah 8/pause 300/speak Leah "What??$5"/pause 300/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 200/speak Wizard "What is fracturing?"/pause 300/move Leah 1 0 3/pause 200/speak Leah "Uh...$5"/pause 300/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 200/speak Wizard "What is... up?$3"/pause 200/emote Leah 40/pause 200/move Leah 1 0 3/pause 500/emote Wizard 40/pause 300/speed farmer 2/move farmer -10 0 3/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "@! Thank goodness!$6"/speed farmer 3/move farmer -6 0 3/move farmer 0 2 2/speak Leah "This woman just walked out of the trees over there. I think she's speaking in tongues. It's really freaking me out!$5"/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 300/speak Wizard "@, what is trembling?"/speak Wizard "$q 566 null#What is trembling?#$r 566 0 event_slang1#Uh... What...?#$r 566 10 event_slang2#Have you been studying slang again?#$r 566 -50 event_slang3#Cut it out! You're scaring Leah."/pause 300/speak Wizard "I have decided to apply my newly learned phrases in casual conversation in an effort to form new connections with the people of this town.$1 "/speak Wizard "$q 562 null#How do I fare?$3#$r 562 -50 event_skillz1#Honestly? That was terrible. Just stick with the spirits.#$r 562 20 event_skillz2#Well... you... uh... you did good.#$r 562 20 event_skillz3#It's a good start, but I think you should practice with someone who knows what you're doing..."/pause 300/speak Leah "You were really just trying to ask 'what's up'?"/pause 300/speak Wizard "Indeed."/speak Leah "Why not just say that?"/pause 500/speak Wizard "...did I not?$3"/pause 300/emote Leah 40/pause 200/emote Wizard 40/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 300/speak Wizard "Perhaps I require more practice.$3#$b#@, you seem to have a strong understanding of these matters.$0"/speak Wizard "$q 579 null#Would you be willing to teach me your ways?$3#$r 579 0 event_moarskillz1#I'm not really very good at it... maybe you should ask someone else.#$r 579 50 event_moarskillz2#Of course! I'd be happy to help you!#$r 579 -50 event_moarskillz3#No way."/pause 500/speak Wizard "I offer apologies, young Leah. When next we meet, I hope to be more adept in the ways of mortal communication.$1#$b#Until then, @, Leah: embrace the mysteries of the day. Learn something new.$1"/pause 500/playSound shwip/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 50/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp/pause 100/jump Leah/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 200/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 200/move Leah -1 0 3/speak Leah "Well. That was... weird.#$b#I hope she doesn't make a habit of sneaking up on people and shouting 'What is up, Canis lupus familiaris?'"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 0/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Leah 40/pause 100/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Leah "Actually I hope she does.$1#$b#Just promise to take some pictures when it happens.$1"/end

Entries.3073004/f Wizard 2000/t 600 2300: WizardSong/7 17/farmer 8 24 0 Wizard 3 19 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Seven ounces swamp moss... One crow feather... Solar essence..."/pause 200/pause 200/speak Wizard "Ast soth suh!$3"/pause 500/speak Wizard "!!!$3"/pause 500/speak Wizard "And still it fails to take!$5"/pause 300/emote Wizard 12/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -3 0 3/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Ah! $3#$b# Oh, @. #$b# I did not hear you enter. You have caught me in the midst of some rather delicate work."/pause 500/question fork1 "#What are you working on?#I guess I should leave you to it, then..."/fork leaveWizard/pause 300/speak Wizard "I find myself in need of a way to produce artificial energies for my own use."/pause 800/speak Wizard "I... ah... have not been sleeping, lately. I hoped to remedy that with this ritual, but I have only achieved frustration, as you might note.$2"/pause 500/emote Wizard 12/speak Wizard "$q 668 null#Tell me, @, what do you do when you cannot sleep?#$r 66 -20 event_sleep1#I never have that problem. A hard day's work tires me out.#$r 66 0 event_sleep2#Count sheep?#$r 66 20 event_sleep3#I take my sleeping bag and lie under the stars, instead. It helps to remember where I am and where I came from."/pause 500/speak Wizard "So I am doomed to toil until I succeed or fall into my own cauldron.$5"/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 0 -1 1/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 5 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 0 -3 1/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 3 0 1/pause 800/emote Wizard 12/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/question fork1 "#Stop her#Leave her alone"/fork leaveWizard/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/faceDirection Wizard 3/emote Wizard 8/pause 1000/emote Wizard 40/pause 1500/speak Wizard "...?#$b# You wish for me to attempt to rest?$3#$b# I assure you, I have tried.$5"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "..."/pause 800/speak Wizard "Oh, very well. If I must. But know that I'll only be back at this as soon as you walk away."/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Wizard 21 17/showFrame Wizard 51/positionOffset Wizard -10 0 0/warp farmer 19 17/playMusic desolate/faceDirection farmer 1/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 18 17 true/pause 1000/speak Wizard "@...$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "Don't let me dream..."/pause 3000/emote Wizard 24/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/message "...She fell asleep."/pause 1500/emote Wizard 24/pause 1500/message "Hopefully she stays that way"/pause 500/message "I'll stay awhile, just to be sure."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation WizardHouse/viewport -1000 -1000/mail wizardNap/friendship Wizard 250/end warpOut
Entries.leaveWizard: pause 1000/message "...Maybe it's best to leave her alone."/pause 500/emote Wizard 12/pause 400/speak Wizard "CURSES!$3"/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/end dialogue Wizard "I'll be fine. Leave me to my work.$5"
Entries.3073012/n hasPickedUpMagicInk/o Wizard/k: WizardSong/2 14/farmer 3 14 3 Wizard 1 14 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You've found my ink! Excellent.$1"/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Er..."/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "Did you... happen to see my ex-wife?$4#$b#No? Well, what about her house...?$4#$b#Do you think she lives alone? Or...$4"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "...Actually, don't tell me... I don't want to know.$5"/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Anyway... you must be wondering about your reward. Here..."/move Wizard -1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "It's a book of summoning.#$b#The arcane potential is immense... but I'll make it simple for you.#$b#By using this book, you can summon magic buildings directly to your farm.#$b#I think you'll find it useful."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Oh, I almost forgot to say... ahem... Thank you."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 800/end
Entries.3073013/n hasPickedUpMagicInk/O Wizard/k: sweet/2 16/farmer 8 24 0 Wizard 3 13 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "@! My heart. $4#$b#You have the ink? $1"/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer -6 0 3/move farmer 0 -4 1/move Wizard 0 1 3/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It shames me still to have sent you on such a task...$4"/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "I hope it was not too taxing for you.#$b#Did you encounter her?#$b#No?#$b#Small blessings."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "I admit I was concerned.$4#$b#But no matter. It went smoothly and for that I am eternally grateful."/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "While you were gone it occurred to me I have a tome which might be of use to you."/move Wizard 0 -1 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "It is a book of summoning. Its arcane potential is immense."/pause 500/move Wizard 0 1 3/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Wizard "Here, let me teach you.$4#$b#By using this book, you will learn to summon magic buildings directly to your farm."/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Wizard "Consider it a small token of my love for you.$4"/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite heart 3 13/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Wizard 12/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "I only wish I could do more..."/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.3073010/o Wizard/k 3073011 529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "Have I ever told you I used to be married?$3"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "Strange, I know... for a woman like me. But it's true."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away.$2"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.$0"/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!#5#$b#I need that magic ink back!$5#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I can't see her again. That's why I need your help.$3"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end
Entries.3073011/O Wizard/k 3073010 529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "I have told you, I believe, of my ex-wife.$0"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "I would prefer not to remember her in your presence. Or at all, for that matter.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "And yet I must. For I have a favor to ask of you.$0"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "After we split, her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path..."/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.$2"/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for she took my magic ink!$5#$b#I need that magic ink back!$5#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I cannot face her. That's why I need your help.$3"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "Perhaps it is cowardly of me to ask this of you, and yet I have nowhere else to turn. Please, @. My heart.$3"/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "Will you do this for me?"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#Of course I will! #Wow. You're asking me to face your ex-wife for you? No thanks."/fork rejectQuest/emote Wizard 20/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah, @! Thank you. Truly. I am immeasurably grateful.$1"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.$3"/pause 500/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "Thank you again, my love.$4"/pause 500/animate Wizard true true 100 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/stopAnimation Wizard 12/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 1500/speak Wizard "I would be lost without you.$1#$b#I will see you at home$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 3000/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/addQuest 28/friendship Wizard 100/end warpOut
Entries.rejectQuest: pause 1500/speak Wizard "Ah...$2#$b#I suppose you are correct. I had no right to ask.$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "In that case, forget I ever spoke of it. I'm sure I will make do.$2#$b#I will see you at home.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 3000/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/friendship Wizard -500/end warpOut
